Created attachment 545343
Screenshot just after I've clicked the Close icon

1. Click to compose new message
2. Start typing something in the TO field
3. Change my mind, backspace everything I have written, thus leaving every single field blank
4. Click on Close (little red X button in upper left-hand corner on OSX)
5. Asked if I want to save the message :(

I don't think there's a need to save nothing.
